def allowed_lowercased_words
  [
    "google analytics",
    "google drive"
  ]
end
    lowercased_words_to_look_for() click to toggle source 
    # File precheck/lib/precheck/rules/other_platforms_rule.rb, line 28
def lowercased_words_to_look_for
  [
    "android",
    "google",
    "compuserve",
    "windows phone",
    "windows 10 mobile",
    "sailfish os",
    "windows universal app",
    "blackberry",
    "palm os",
    "symbian"
  ].map(&:downcase)
end
